GK16bhakavpu:707: atha pratijñāhetvādi- hīnaṃ duṣṭaṃ ca varṇyate /
GK16bhakavpu:715: na sa śabdo na tadvācyaṃ na sa nyāyo na sā kalā /
GK16bhakavpu:717: jāyate yanna kāvyāṅgam aho bhāro mahān kaveḥ // Bh_5.4 //
GK16bhakavpu:724: jātyādyapohe vṛttiḥ kva kva viśeṣaḥ kutaśca saḥ // Bh_5.7 //
GK16bhakavpu:725: tadapoheṣu ca tathā siddhā sā buddhigocarā /
GK16bhakavpu:726: avastukaṃ cedvitathaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tattvavṛtti hi // Bh_5.8 //
GK16bhakavpu:738: tadvido nāntarīyārtha- darśanaṃ cāpare viduḥ // Bh_5.11 //
GK16bhakavpu:743: prasiddhadharmā pratyakṣa- bādhinī ceti duṣyati // Bh_5.13 //
GK16bhakavpu:758: yathā śucistanustrīṇi pramāṇāni na santi vā // Bh_5.18 //
GK16bhakavpu:765: yathā śīto 'nalo nāsti rūpamuṣṇaḥ kṣapākaraḥ // Bh_5.20 //
GK16bhakavpu:782: %% Purport: anugati and vyāvṛtti are required respectively in 2 things (viz. pakṣa and sapakṣa)
GK16bhakavpu:787: khyāpyate yena dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa kilānyairdvidhocyate // Bh_5.27 //
GK16bhakavpu:790: % hetvādinātha vā] /edM; hetvādinātra ca /edB; hetvādinātha ca /edBGa
GK16bhakavpu:794: tāsāṃ prapañco bahudhā bhūyastvādiha noditaḥ // Bh_5.29 //
GK16bhakavpu:796: idaṃ tu śāstragarbheṣu kāvyeṣvabhihitaṃ yathā // Bh_5.30 //
GK16bhakavpu:798: kāraṇaṃ cenna tannityaṃ nityaṃ cetkāraṇaṃ na tat // Bh_5.31 //
GK16bhakavpu:808: sadaiva vāri sindhūnām aho sthemā mahārciṣaḥ // Bh_5.34 //
GK16bhakavpu:810: rūpādīnāṃ yathā dravyam āśrayo naśyatīti ca /
GK16bhakavpu:825: kṛtvā pratijñāṃ vatsena hṛteti madanāśrayā // Bh_5.38 //
GK16bhakavpu:827: pratijñāya yathā bhīmas taccakārāvaśo ruṣā // Bh_5.39 //
GK16bhakavpu:828: kāryo 'nyatra pratijñāyāḥ prayogo na kathaṃ cana /
GK16bhakavpu:837: pituḥ priyāya yāṃ bhīṣmaś cakre sā kāmabādhinī // Bh_5.43 //
GK16bhakavpu:839: jāmadagnyaṃ yudhā jitvā sā jñeyā kopabādhinī // Bh_5.44 //
GK16bhakavpu:846: ko vā gatvaramarthibhyo na yacchati dhanaṃ laghu // Bh_5.46 //
GK16bhakavpu:847: kimityayaṃ tu yaḥ kṣepaḥ saukaryaṃ darśayatyasau /
GK16bhakavpu:852: kūjanātkurarīṇāṃ ca kamalānāṃ ca saurabhāt // Bh_5.48 //
GK16bhakavpu:891: mukhaṃ padmamivetyatra kiṃ sādhyaṃ kiṃ ca sādhanam // Bh_5.56 //
GK16bhakavpu:894: śreyān vṛddhānuśiṣṭatvāt pūrve kṛtayuge yathā // Bh_5.57 //
GK16bhakavpu:899: tvameva vīra pradyumnas tvameva naravāhanaḥ // Bh_5.59 //
GK16bhakavpu:908: kāvyaṃ kapitthamāmaṃ yat keṣāṃcittādṛśaṃ yathā // Bh_5.62 //
GK16bhakavpu:909: % kapitthamāmaṃ yat keṣāṃcittādṛśaṃ] /edM; kapitthamāmraṃ vat(maṃca) keṣāñcitsadṛśaṃ /edB
GK16bhakavpu:913: ahighnapadmasya jalāridhāmnas tavaiva nānyasya sutasya vṛttam // Bh_5.63 //
GK16bhakavpu:920: bahukusumavibhūṣite sa tasthau suramunisiddhayute sumerupṛṣṭhe // Bh_5.65 //
GK16bhakavpu:928: śaṅkhavrātākulo 'ntastimimakarakulākīrṇavīcīpratāno dadhre yasyāmburāśiḥ śaśikumudasudhākṣīraśuddhāṃ sukīrtim // Bh_5.68 //
GK16bhakavpu:933: iti nigaditāstāstā vācāmalaṅkṛtayo mayā bahuvidhakṛtīrdṛṣṭvānyeṣāṃ svayaṃ paritarkya ca /
GK16bhakavpu:934: prathitavacasaḥ santo 'bhijñāḥ pramāṇamihāpare gurutaradhiyāmasvārādhaṃ mano 'kṛtabuddhibhiḥ // Bh_5.69 //
GK16bhakavpu:944: śabdaratnaṃ svayaṃgamyam alaṃ kartumayaṃ janam // Bh_6.3 //
GK16bhakavpu:946: tasya cādhigame yatnaḥ kāryaṃ kāvyaṃ vidhitsatā /
GK16bhakavpu:947: parapratyayato yattu kriyate tena kā ratiḥ // Bh_6.4 //
GK16bhakavpu:959: varṇānāṃ kramavṛttitvān nyāyā nāpi ca saṃhatiḥ // Bh_6.9 //
GK16bhakavpu:963: tasmātkūṭastha ityeṣā śābdī vaḥ kalpanā vṛthā /
GK16bhakavpu:968: vyavahārāya lokasya prāgitthaṃ samayaḥ kṛtaḥ // Bh_6.13 //
GK16bhakavpu:971: vinaśvaro 'stu nityo vā sambandho 'rthena vā satā /
GK16bhakavpu:972: namo 'stu tebhyo vidvadbhyaḥ pramāṇaṃ ye 'sya niścitau // Bh_6.15 //
GK16bhakavpu:978: janako gavi gobuddher mṛgyatāmaparo dhvaniḥ // Bh_6.17 //
GK16bhakavpu:980: apavādavidhijñāne phale caikasya vaḥ katham // Bh_6.18 //
GK16bhakavpu:984: ke śabdāḥ kiṃ ca tadvācyam ityaho vartma dustaram // Bh_6.20 //
GK16bhakavpu:990: vakravācāṃ kavīnāṃ ye prayogaṃ prati sādhavaḥ /
GK16bhakavpu:991: prayoktuṃ ye na yuktāśca tadviveko 'yamucyate // Bh_6.23 //
GK16bhakavpu:993: tulyārthatve 'pi hi brūyāt ko hantiṃ gativācinam // Bh_6.24 //
GK16bhakavpu:994: śrautrādiṃ na tu durbodhaṃ na duṣṭādimapeśalam /
GK16bhakavpu:996: grāmyaṃ na piṇḍīśūrādiṃ na ḍitthādimapārthakam // Bh_6.25 //
GK16bhakavpu:998: na leśajñāpakākṛṣṭaṃ sa hanti dhyāti vā yathā // Bh_6.26 //
GK16bhakavpu:1001: chandovaditi cotsargān na cāpi cchāndasaṃ vadet // Bh_6.27 //
GK16bhakavpu:1006: tamādriyeta prāyeṇa na tu yogavibhāgajam // Bh_6.29 //
GK16bhakavpu:1008: asyāṃ suvarṇālaṃkāraḥ puṣṇāti nitarāṃ śriyam // Bh_6.30 //
GK16bhakavpu:1011: sarūpaśeṣaṃ tu pumān striyā yatra ca śiṣyate /
GK16bhakavpu:1012: yathāha varuṇāvindrau bhavau śarvau mṛḍāviti // Bh_6.32 //
GK16bhakavpu:1018: yathā vidvānadhīte 'sau tiṣṭhadgu ca vahadgu ca // Bh_6.35 //
GK16bhakavpu:1022: akena ca na kurvīta vṛttiṃ tadgamako yathā // Bh_6.37 //
GK16bhakavpu:1023: pañcarājīti ca yathā prayuñjīta dviguṃ striyām /
GK16bhakavpu:1026: priyonmanāyate sā te kiṃ śaṭhābhimanāyase // Bh_6.39 //
GK16bhakavpu:1027: tṛtīyaikavacaḥ ṣaṣṭhyām āmantaṃ ca vadet kvipi /
GK16bhakavpu:1032: puṃsi striyāṃ ca kvasvantam icchantyacchāndasaṃ kila /
GK16bhakavpu:1033: upeyuṣāmapi divaṃ yathā na vyeti cārutā // Bh_6.42 //
GK16bhakavpu:1036: % kañcukaṃ stane] /edM; kantuke stanau /edB; kantukau stanau /edBGha
GK16bhakavpu:1047: tasya hārī stanābhogo vadanaṃ hāri sundaram /
GK16bhakavpu:1048: hāriṇī tanuratyantaṃ kiyanna harate manaḥ // Bh_6.47 //
GK16bhakavpu:1055: śākārau jāguriṣṭau ca jāgaryā jāgarā yathā // Bh_6.49 //
GK16bhakavpu:1058: lyuṭaṃ ca kartṛviṣayaṃ devano ramaṇo yathā // Bh_6.50 //
GK16bhakavpu:1061: añmahārajanāllākṣā- rocanābhyāṃ tathā ca ṭhak // Bh_6.51 //
GK16bhakavpu:1063: ḍmatubiṣṭaṃ ca kumudād yatheyaṃ bhūḥ kumudvatī /
GK16bhakavpu:1064: ṭhak cāpi tena jayatīty ākṣikaḥ śāstriko yathā // Bh_6.52 //
GK16bhakavpu:1066: tataśchamiṣṭyā ca yathā sārvaḥ sarvīya ityapi // Bh_6.53 //
GK16bhakavpu:1074: inacca phalabarhābhyāṃ phalino barhiṇo yathā // Bh_6.56 //
GK16bhakavpu:1075: iniḥ prayuktaḥ prāyeṇa tathā ṭhaṃśca manīṣibhiḥ /
GK16bhakavpu:1076: tatrāpi mekhālāmālā- māyānāṃ sutarāṃ matau // Bh_6.57 //
GK16bhakavpu:1082: asau dadhadalaṃkāraṃ srajaṃ bibhracca śobhate // Bh_6.59 //
GK16bhakavpu:1084: % na tavargaṃ śakāreṇa kvacit saṃyoginaṃ] /edM; /lacuna raṃ yoginaṃ /edB
GK16bhakavpu:1091: śabdārṇavasya yadi kaścidupaiti pāraṃ bhīmāmbhasaśca jaladheriti vismayo 'sau // Bh_6.62 //
GK16bhakavpu:1092: vidyānāṃ satatamapāśrayo 'parāsāṃ tāsūktānna ca viruṇaddhi kāṃścidarthān /
GK16bhakavpu:1094: śraddheyaṃ jagati mataṃ hi pāṇinīyaṃ mādhyasthyādbhavati na kasyacitpramāṇam // Bh_6.63 //
GK16bhakavpu:1095: avalokya matāni satkavīnām avagamya svadhiyā ca kāvyalakṣma /
GK16bhakavpu:1100: %% Thus /edB; /edM/ places its colophon after verse 66.
GK16bhakavpu:1103: ṣaṣṭyā śabdasya śuddhiḥ syād ityevaṃ vastupañcakam /
GK16bhakavpu:1105: uktaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ paricchedair bhāmahena krameṇa vaḥ // Bh_6.66 //
